trans-unit.source: Describes the service’s authentication behavior.
trans-unit.target: Describe el comportamiento de autenticación del servicio.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that represents the authentication scheme used by the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor que representa el esquema de autenticación usado por el servicio.

trans-unit.source: The authentication scheme used by the service.
trans-unit.target: Esquema de autenticación usado por servicio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" /> associated with this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" /> asociada con este comportamiento.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the service should serialize authentication schemes.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve si el servicio debe serializar esquemas de autenticación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the service should serialize authentication schemes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> si el servicio debe serializar esquemas de autenticación; si no, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" /> should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" /> debe serializarse; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The service description of the service.
trans-unit.target: Descripción del servicio.

trans-unit.source: The host of the service.
trans-unit.target: Host de servicio.

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: puntos de conexión del servicio.

trans-unit.source: Custom objects to which binding elements have access.
trans-unit.target: Objetos personalizados a los que los elementos de enlace tienen acceso.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementación del método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called once for each listen URI.
trans-unit.target: Este método se llama una vez para cada URI de escucha.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a service has four endpoints, and two of them have the same listen URI, then this method gets called three times.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si un servicio tiene cuatro extremos y dos de ellos tienen el mismo URI de escucha, se llamará tres veces a este método.

trans-unit.source: The reason is that the `bindingParameters` target each channel stack and there is one channel stack for each listen URI.
trans-unit.target: La razón es que los `bindingParameters` tienen como destino cada pila del canal y existe una pila de canal para cada URI de escucha.

trans-unit.source: Because each call receives those endpoints at that listen URI, two calls each get a single <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, and one call gets a collection of two <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Dado que cada llamada recibe esos extremos en esa URI de escucha, dos llamadas obtienen un único <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> y una llamada obtiene una colección de dos objetos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Descripción del servicio.

trans-unit.source: The host that is currently being built.
trans-unit.target: Host que se está generando actualmente.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementación del método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" />.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Descripción del servicio.

trans-unit.source: The service host that is currently being constructed.
trans-unit.target: Host del servicio que se está construyendo actualmente.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior.System#ServiceModel#Description#IServiceBehavior#Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementación del método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior.System#ServiceModel#Description#IServiceBehavior#Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" />.
